content:
That's a great idea! Scheduling a video call with your cousins in California is a wonderful way to catch up and hear about their new baby boy. It's always exciting to see new additions to the family, and I'm sure you're eager to hear all about their little one.

Video calls are a fantastic way to stay connected with loved ones who live far away. You can use platforms like Zoom, Skype, or FaceTime to connect with your cousins and see each other's faces in real-time. It's almost like being there in person!

Before you schedule the call, you might want to consider a few things:

1. **Time zones**: Make sure you're aware of the time difference between your location and California, so you can schedule the call at a convenient time for everyone.
2. **Scheduling**: Pick a date and time that works for everyone, and make sure to send out reminders so no one forgets.
3. **Technical issues**: Do a quick test call before the scheduled time to ensure your internet connection and video conferencing platform are working properly.

Once you've got everything set up, you can sit back, relax, and enjoy your video call with your cousins. I'm sure you'll have a great time catching up and hearing all about their new baby boy!
